prompt:
The journalist received an anonymous death threat after exposing corruption in the local government.
She woke up to find an anonymous death threat scrawled on her doorstep, chilling her to the bone.
Activists protesting the war faced anonymous death threats from shadowy online trolls.

The whistleblower went into hiding after an anonymous death threat arrived in the mail.
Online harassment escalated to an anonymous death threat posted on her social media profile.
The gang leader issued an anonymous death threat to rival members through encrypted messages.
During the heated debate, the opponent whispered about receiving an anonymous death threat.
Police investigated the anonymous death threat left on the victim's voicemail late at night.
